DOC.brief_summary: This study design compare efficacy follow two anesthetic method transnasal endoscopy - `` Catheter-free method '' - `` Catheter-insertion method ''
DOC.brief_title: Trial New Pretreatment Method Transnasal Endoscopy
DOC.detailed_description: 1 . Check medical history ( method ) 1. underlying systemic disease 2. drug allergy 3. anticoagulant antiplatelet use 2 . Premedication ( method ) 1. take premedication contain dimethylpolysiloxane , pronase , sodium bicarbonate improve endoscopic visualization 2. spray naphazolin acetate nasal cavity decrease secretion 3 . Different anesthetic method transnasal endoscopy 1 . `` Catheter-free method '' : spray epinephrine nasal cavity 2 . `` Catheter-insertion method '' : spray epinephrine lidocaine nasal cavity
DOC.criteria: Routine checkup patient nasal operation , allergy , possibility hemorrhage
